title: Read files stored in a SharePoint — SharePoint_file
code: if (FALSE) { SharePoint_file(   SharePoint = "https://page.sharepoint.com",   drive = "Documents",   file = "Book.xlsx",   .function = readxl::read_xlsx,   sheet = c("Sheet1", "Sheet2")   ) }
